Description:
The Final Version of the Hurdle Challenge ! Map designed to improve your Ground-to-Air dribble & your flying skills !

New Features :

- Textures (Grass/Wood)
- Timer
- Checkpoint & Respawn
- Hidden "Superman Challenge"

Feel free to comment with your best time :)

Specials thanks to BIGROBizzle who helped me a lot with the understanding of respawn & Checkpoints systems ! Link to  his last map (you should definitively check it out) :

https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1872143687
